main event: An illuminated circular object emitting a pulsing light and sound was seen rapidly moving across the sky in the Pirapora area of Brazil.
interesting points: The object was described as a flying disk with an intense blue-green color and measuring approximately 6 to 8 meters in diameter., It was observed to fly at high speeds, making abrupt changes in trajectory., The object emitted a sound similar to that of a jet flying low., Multiple people reported seeing the object from various locations at different times of the day., The report included confirmations from astronomers and military personnel, highlighting the seriousness of the observations.
witness description: Various observers including astronomers and military personnel
